title: Nathalie Boy de la Tour
text:
Nathalie Katia Boy de la Tour (; ' Szenberg; born 19 August 1968) is a French <a href="Association%20football">football</a> executive. She has been president of the <a href="Ligue%20de%20Football%20Professionnel">Ligue de Football Professionnel</a> since 11 November 2016.
Biography.
Boy de la Tour graduated with a master's degree from <a href="ESCP%20Europe">ESCP Europe</a> in 1991. She later worked for consultancy firm <a href="Capgemini">Bossard Gemini</a> and advertising agency <a href="BBDO">BBDO</a>. In July 2013, she became the first female member of the administrative council of the Ligue de Football Professionnel (LFP). In November 2016, she was elected president by the LFP's general assembly, defeating the council's nominee <a href="Raymond%20Domenech">Raymond Domenech</a>.
Honours.
